operation.expression: util:iif($temp.Task[1]/output[1]/Task_Status=2, 'Integration Step Completed with Warning', 'Integration Step Completed')
util:iif($temp.Task[1]/output[1]/Task_Status=2, 'Integration Step Completed with Warning', 'Integration Step Completed')

let $job_output := $temp.Task[1]/fault[1] let $detail := <detail> Error Message: {$job_output/reason/text()} </detail> return replace(normalize-space(replace($detail/text(),"
"," ")),"['\[\]]","") (: We have to replace line breaks from the text as there seem to be defect to pass parameters to DI task whens string param contains line breaks :)
